nls.description: The list of rule enabled object and its sub-objects.
nls.name: Rule Enabled Objects

dynamicLookup.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:o.code:code@, @SELECT:nls.name:name@, @SELECT:o.api_alias:api_alias@, @SELECT:nls.language_code:language_code@ FROM ( SELECT oo.id AS id, oo.code as code, oo.parent_object_code as parent_object_code, oo.api_alias as api_alias FROM odf_objects oo JOIN odf_blueprints b ON ( @UPPER@(oo.code) = b.type OR @UPPER@(oo.parent_object_code) = b.type ) WHERE oo.is_re_enabled = 1 AND oo.is_api_enabled = 1 AND b.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ UNION ALL SELECT oo.id AS id, oo.code as code, oo.parent_object_code as parent_object_code, oo.api_alias as api_alias FROM odf_objects oo JOIN (SELECT SUBSTRING(relative_path, CHARINDEX('.', relative_path)+1, LEN(relative_path)) moduleid from blp_available_visuals bav, odf_blueprints ob where ob.id= @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ and bav.relative_path IS NOT NULL and ob.type=bav.blueprint_type) b on oo.api_alias=b.moduleid WHERE oo.is_re_enabled = 1 AND oo.is_api_enabled = 1 AND oo.parent_object_code = 'inv' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM odf_objects oo JOIN odf_blueprints b ON @UPPER@(oo.code) = b.type WHERE oo.parent_object_code IS NULL AND ( oo.template_extension IS NOT NULL OR oo.code IN ('project', 'idea' ) ) AND b.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ ) EXCEPT SELECT oo.id AS id, oo.code as code, oo.parent_object_code as parent_object_code, oo.api_alias as api_alias FROM odf_objects oo WHERE oo.code = 'cop_prj_statusrpt' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM blp_visual_enabled_attrs bvea JOIN odf_objects a ON a.api_alias = bvea.resource_api_alias JOIN odf_blueprints b ON upper(a.code) = b.type AND b.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ WHERE bvea.attr_api_alias = 'projectStatusReports' ) ) o JOIN cmn_captions_nls nls ON o.id = nls.pk_id AND language_code = @where:param:language@ AND nls.table_name = 'ODF_OBJECTS' WHERE @FILTER@

SELECT @SELECT:o.code:code@, @SELECT:nls.name:name@, @SELECT:o.api_alias:api_alias@, @SELECT:nls.language_code:language_code@ FROM ( SELECT oo.id AS id, oo.code as code, oo.parent_object_code as parent_object_code, oo.api_alias as api_alias FROM odf_objects oo JOIN odf_blueprints b ON ( @UPPER@(oo.code) = b.type OR @UPPER@(oo.parent_object_code) = b.type ) WHERE oo.is_re_enabled = 1 AND oo.is_api_enabled = 1 AND b.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ UNION ALL SELECT oo.id AS id, oo.code as code, oo.parent_object_code as parent_object_code, oo.api_alias as api_alias FROM odf_objects oo join (select SUBSTR(relative_path, INSTR(relative_path, '.')+1, length(relative_path)) moduleid from blp_available_visuals bav, odf_blueprints ob where ob.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ and bav.relative_path IS NOT NULL and ob.type=bav.blueprint_type) b on oo.api_alias=b.moduleid WHERE oo.is_re_enabled = 1 AND oo.is_api_enabled = 1 AND oo.parent_object_code = 'inv' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM odf_objects oo JOIN odf_blueprints b ON @UPPER@(oo.code) = b.type WHERE oo.parent_object_code IS NULL AND ( oo.template_extension IS NOT NULL OR oo.code IN ('project', 'idea' ) ) AND b.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ ) MINUS SELECT oo.id AS id, oo.code as code, oo.parent_object_code as parent_object_code, oo.api_alias as api_alias FROM odf_objects oo WHERE oo.code = 'cop_prj_statusrpt' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM blp_visual_enabled_attrs bvea JOIN odf_objects a ON a.api_alias = bvea.resource_api_alias JOIN odf_blueprints b ON upper(a.code) = b.type AND b.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ WHERE bvea.attr_api_alias = 'projectStatusReports' ) ) o JOIN cmn_captions_nls nls ON o.id = nls.pk_id AND language_code = @where:param:language@ AND nls.table_name = 'ODF_OBJECTS' WHERE @FILTER@

SELECT @SELECT:o.code:code@, @SELECT:nls.name:name@, @SELECT:o.api_alias:api_alias@, @SELECT:nls.language_code:language_code@ FROM ( SELECT oo.id AS id, oo.code as code, oo.parent_object_code as parent_object_code, oo.api_alias as api_alias FROM odf_objects oo JOIN odf_blueprints b ON ( @UPPER@(oo.code) = b.type OR @UPPER@(oo.parent_object_code) = b.type ) WHERE oo.is_re_enabled = 1 AND oo.is_api_enabled = 1 AND b.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ UNION ALL SELECT oo.id AS id, oo.code as code, oo.parent_object_code as parent_object_code, oo.api_alias as api_alias FROM odf_objects oo JOIN (SELECT SUBSTRING(relative_path, position('.' in relative_path)+1, length(relative_path)) moduleid from blp_available_visuals bav, odf_blueprints ob where ob.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ and bav.relative_path IS NOT NULL and ob.type=bav.blueprint_type) b on oo.api_alias=b.moduleid WHERE oo.is_re_enabled = 1 AND oo.is_api_enabled = 1 AND oo.parent_object_code = 'inv' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM odf_objects oo JOIN odf_blueprints b ON @UPPER@(oo.code) = b.type WHERE oo.parent_object_code IS NULL AND ( oo.template_extension IS NOT NULL OR oo.code IN ('project', 'idea' ) ) AND b.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ ) EXCEPT SELECT oo.id AS id, oo.code as code, oo.parent_object_code as parent_object_code, oo.api_alias as api_alias FROM odf_objects oo WHERE oo.code = 'cop_prj_statusrpt' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM blp_visual_enabled_attrs bvea JOIN odf_objects a ON a.api_alias = bvea.resource_api_alias JOIN odf_blueprints b ON upper(a.code) = b.type AND b.id = @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:BLUEPRINT_ID@ WHERE bvea.attr_api_alias = 'projectStatusReports' ) ) o JOIN cmn_captions_nls nls ON o.id = nls.pk_id AND language_code = @where:param:language@ AND nls.table_name = 'ODF_OBJECTS' WHERE @FILTER@
